LanguageData.VQEA_AncientLaboratoryCasket_Empty.label: empty ancient laboratory casket
LanguageData.VQEA_AncientLaboratoryCasket_Empty.descr: An empty research pod once used to contain human test subjects.
LanguageData.VQEA_AncientLaboratoryCasket.label: ancient laboratory casket
LanguageData.VQEA_AncientLaboratoryCasket.description: A sealed research pod once used to contain human test subjects. Opening it may release whoever or whatever was left inside.
LanguageData.VQEA_CandidateCryptosleepCasket_Empty.de: A specialized cryptosleep chamber once used to preserve designated ideal test subjects for experiments. It now sits empty.
LanguageData.VQEA_CandidateCryptosleepCasket.label: candidate cryptosleep casket
LanguageData.VQEA_CandidateCryptosleepCasket.descript: A specialized cryptosleep chamber once used to preserve designated ideal test subjects for experiments. It still hums faintly with power, holding something dormant inside.
